short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists the 10-15 most recent accessed pages in your Notion workspace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The **Notion Recent Pages** extension for Google Chrome helps you quickly access the 10-15 most recently viewed pages in your Notion workspace. It displays these pages in a convenient popup, allowing you to easily navigate to your most recently used Notion documents.
